p: We identified 170 papers through PubMed, Web of science and Google Scholar databases and 20 papers through reference cross-check and internet research of conference abstracts. After duplicate removal, a total of 130 papers were screened for relevance. Abstracts and titles screening identified 32 studies that met the inclusion criteria. After the full-text analyses, 12 of these studies were excluded. Hence, twenty studies were eligible according to our criteria and were included in this review ( Fig. 1).
